text: Bruno Cabrerizo (born July 19, 1979) is a former Brazilian football player, model and actor. ==Career== Cabrerizo joined Japanese J2 League club Sagan Tosu in 2003. He debuted as defensive midfielder in J2 against Shonan Bellmare on April 9. He played many matches as defensive midfielder and center back after the debut.
